sentences: Franz Xaver Chwatal (19 June 1808 – 24 June 1879) was a Bohemian pianist, composer and music teacher.
Chwatal was born in Rumburg, Bohemia (in the modern Czech Republic).
From 1822 to 1832 he worked as a music teacher in Merseburg, where he created his first compositions.
From 1835, he worked as a music teacher in Magdeburg.
In the 1850s, he travelled with Christian Friedrich Ehrlich to the Institute für Gemeinschaftlichen Clavierunterricht (Institute for Community Piano Lessons).
